text: Yo pana bhikkhu anupasampannena uttaridirattatirattaṃ sahaseyyaṃ kappeyya pācittiyaṃ
edit: Yo pana bhikkhu anupasampannena uttaridirattatirattaṃ sahaseyyaṃ kappeyya pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: 5. Should any bhikkhu lie down together (in the same dwelling) with an unordained person for more than two or three consecutive nights, it is to be confessed.
๕. อนึ่ง ภิกษุใด สำเร็จการนอนร่วมกับอนุปสัมบันยิ่งกว่า ๒-๓ คืนเป็นปาจิตตีย์
5. Should any bhikkhu sleep for more than two or three nights along with one not fully accepted, this entails expiation.
